snippet.title: Forking Hell - Tutorial cinematic video
snippet.description:
Check out the tutorial cinematic from the upcoming game, Forking Hell! 

Welcome to the Amazing Logistics warehouse, the robot powered e-commerce service of the future. Take control of a forklift around in this single player casual frenzy experience, and pack the truck with customer orders throughout the working day while avoiding the chaotic robots and chase your promotion

Coming summer 2020 to Steam and Itch.io!
Developer: https://www.lb-games.co.uk/
